============================================================

[IMG]http://www7.pic-upload.de/15.08.13/7trz8926c1nr.png[/IMG]

- Replaces all Male face textures
- Texture size is 4096x4096

============================================================

[IMG]http://www7.pic-upload.de/15.08.13/544xp3d8yf9.png[/IMG]

Using Nexus Mod Manager

or manual

1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files
2. Find the Skyrim folder here: Steamsteamappscommonskyrim
3. Move the Data folder into your Skyrim folder
4. Merge the folder when asked, it will not get replaced

============================================================

[IMG]http://www7.pic-upload.de/15.08.13/ssel3tl9fxd.png[/IMG]

============================================================

When you like the mod, please endorse and support my work.
I've you like, you can upload some screenshots for this site.
